subject: Maisie Meets Arya
event: Over across the water in the fabled British Isles, Sky is getting ready to launch their new "Sky Atlantic" channel, scheduled to debut on February 1. Posters and billboards are going up all over the UK, and in Ireland as well. The ads promote three shows that Sky Atlantic will soon ber featuring: BOARDWALK EMPIRE, MAD MEN, and... GAME OF THRONES. Billboards have been seen all over London, in Dublin, in Gloucester, Wakefield, Bath... and many more places, I don't doubt. One of them popped up ten minutes from where Maisie Williams lives, so Maisie came face to face with Arya, and her mum sent me the picture:

comments.article: Fantastic shot! Love it. Have been seeing these posters around myself and getting very excited! Was so glad to hear GoT was going to be shown here in the UK~ Yay HBO!

Way to go, Maisie.

She acts just like I would if I had a part in the series and saw myself in a billboard across the street. It's very cute.

Sigh...too bad US TV advertisements aren't that awesome. Then again, if they were, there'd be way more accidents.

BTW, a channel that shows Mad Men, Boardwalk Empire, and Game of Thrones? How dare the US be denied all this greatness in one place!
comments.subject: Awsome photo and awesome channel

comments.upictitle: Souffl√© Girl Wannabe: GoT Jaime Kingsguard
comments.article: That is entirely too cute for words! I'm so looking forward to seeing her playing Arya on the screen, even if my heart goes out to the poor kid given what she's got in store to do as the character in future.
That's amazing!  I hope Sky Atlantic is on Freeview or I may have to consider buying Sky just for Game of Thrones...

Not on Freeview, and not available to UPC customers either. "Exclusive for all Sky TV viewers."

So, obvious question - when's the boxed set out?
She is so cute.  I cannot wait to see her representation of Arya!
Yes Virginia, there is a Cutest Thing Ever.
That's adorable.  Can't wait to see her in action!!
SWEET!
That is freaking awesome :D
That has to be a huge thrill for her...
Can't wait!

Nice picture (I wish we had those billboards around here!).

The advertisements - on both television and elsewhere - seem pretty GRIMDARK, though.

That is the cutest/coolest thing I've seen today.

Then again...I'm re-reading Clash of Kings right now, and I'm wondering if Maisie knows what hell she's in for next season...
comments.subject: Nice!

comments.article: Her mum has read the books.  Maisie is still too young for 'em.
comments.subject: Re: Nice!

comments.article: Jealous! Wish we had those billboards in America. But also awesome. :) So excited for this show!

I split my time between Pennsylvania and Vermont, and one of the highlights of the drive is when the billboards END at the VT state line...however, if these ads were up in PA, NJ or NY I might have to stop and get a pic or two...
comments.subject: billboards...

comments.article: That's such a cute picture.

Adorable! I'm so very excited to see her play Arya...she might be the favoritest of my favorite kickass little girls (having nearly surpassed Lyra Silvertongue, which is no easy feat IMO).

i wonder if Maisie has any idea just how truly awesome her character is.
Oh, wow!  That is so cool!

Maisie and Maisie's Mom,

We freakin LOVE you!

Good promotion for the series!

And Masie looks delighted and excited, obviously pleased to be involved - as well she should be!

Child actors have a tough job, and it is always nice to see them do well. I wish her all the best.
Aw!!!  Cutest pic (and Sean Bean ain't bad either)!

How cool!

We're all getting very excited about the premiere over here! Invites for friends have been made for a viewing party at our house and pretty much everyone has said they'd be here for it.
We need more from you on the Jets game, George.  A heck of a lot more.  Bear your soul.
comments.subject: Soul

comments.article:
That's so cute.

I wonder if people would recognize her...
Oh my gosh, she's SO CUTE!!!!!
